name: Portfolio-Website
description: A responsive and interactive portfolio website built using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
features: Built a responsive and interactive website using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.
Used Redux for managing state and implemented pagination to display a limited number of items per page.
Created a custom hook to handle form validation and error messages.
Added a search functionality using the Debounce function to optimize performance.

name: Advance Filtering
description: A simple web application for managing and filtering events using React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS.
features: Implemented advanced filtering options to enhance search functionality.
Optimized performance using Debounce function to reduce unnecessary re-renders.
Built a clean and responsive UI with Tailwind CSS.
Used Redux for efficient state management.

name: NetFlix-Clone
technologies: React | Redux | TailwindCSS | Node.js | Express.js | MongoDB-Compass
description: A Netflix-like web application built using React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, along with a Node.js backend using Express.js and MongoDB.
features: Implemented user authentication and authorization.
Integrated a video streaming feature with a user-friendly UI.
Used Redux for efficient state management.
Added a search functionality with filters for better user experience.

name: Event-Handler
technologies: React | Redux | TailwindCSS | Node.js | Express.js | MongoDB
description: A web application for managing events using React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, along with a Node.js backend using Express.js and MongoDB.
features: Built a responsive event management system with React and Tailwind CSS.
Implemented real-time event updates and CRUD operations.
Used Redux for state management and MongoDB for database storage.
Optimized API calls using Express.js and improved performance.

name: Study-Buddy Web-App
description: A web application for managing student-teacher relationships using HTML, CSS, Django, and SQLite.
features: Designed an interactive platform for students and teachers to collaborate.
Implemented authentication and role-based access control.
Used SQLite for lightweight and efficient database management.
Optimized UI/UX with responsive layouts for better accessibility.
